attributes.action: Stop McCoys Crisps belonging to men
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a British Citizen, i like to believe that we as a country treat both genders as equal. But apparently McCoys disagrees. As a fan of McCoys and a Women i'm very dissapointed of McCoys because i feel i don't have the right to eat the crisps because i'm not a Man.
Please sign my petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
